mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVE VALUES(SEQ_RESERVE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{reserveCount}, #{paymentCode}, DEFAULT, #{entranceDate}, #{paymentPrice}, DEFAULT, #{memberNo}, #{displayNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT RESERVE_NO, RESERVE_COUNT, PAYMENT_CODE, PAYMENT_DATE, TO_CHAR(ENTRANCE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENTRANCE_DATE, PAYMENT_PRICE, RESERVE_STATUS, MEMBER_NO, DISPLAY_NO FROM RESERVE WHERE RESERVE_NO = (SELECT MAX(RESERVE_NO) FROM RESERVE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo})

SELECT RESERVE_NO, RESERVE_COUNT, PAYMENT_CODE, PAYMENT_DATE, TO_CHAR(ENTRANCE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENTRANCE_DATE, PAYMENT_PRICE, RESERVE_STATUS, MEMBER_NO, DISPLAY_NO FROM RESERVE WHERE RESERVE_NO = #{reserveNo}

SELECT RESERVE_NO, RESERVE_COUNT, TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PAYMENT_DATE, TO_CHAR(ENTRANCE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENTRANCE_DATE, PAYMENT_PRICE, RESERVE_STATUS, MEMBER_NO, DISPLAY_NAME AS DISPLAY_NO FROM RESERVE R LEFT JOIN DISPLAY D ON (R.DISPLAY_NO = D.DISPLAY_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY RESERVE_NO DESC
